verse.unicode: ਬੋਲ ਉਠੈ ਕਈ ਕੋਟਿ ਬਲੀ ਜਬ ਏਕ ਕੋ ਲੈ ਕਰਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਬੁਲਈਯੈ ॥

en.bdb: When the name of one person was announced, then millions of them responded to the call

en.bdb: The drums of the warriors resounded and in that din, no one’s voice was hear
